q: How much does the service cost?
a: We work with a basic subscription plus an upfront payment for setup. Extra features like more languages, videos, or booking system are available as add-ons.

q: Can I use my own domain?
a: Yes! Your restaurant gets a free subdomain (xxx.myrestaurantmenu.com). If you prefer a custom domain, it's included with an annual contract, otherwise it has an extra cost.
Absolutely. You can display your QR menu in as many languages as you want. Each extra language can be added as an add-on.

q: How do I update my menu or information?
a: Restaurant owners have access to a CMS where they can easily add, edit, or delete products, update information, and manage campaigns.

q: What kind of campaigns can I create?
a: You can highlight a dish of the day, promote special events like New Year’s Eve, or create custom marketing campaigns. It’s very flexible and creative.

q: Can I place ads in my menu?
a: Yes, owners can place advertisements inside the menu. This is great for partnerships and promotions.

q: What can my restaurant’s customers do?
a: Customers can sign in to get gift cards, collect stamp cards, like or save their favorite meals, and in the future even call a waiter or place an order.

q: How do I get customer support?
a: We provide support by email and respond in less than 24 hours.
